DOC.brief_title: Predictors Self-management Patients With Chronic Low Back Pain
DOC.detailed_description: Materials method : Patients recruit baseline physiotherapy outpatient clinic . Three different method plan identify suitable patient study : outpatient clinic , advertisement therapist referral study . All willing participant screen study selection criterion . Eligible participant provide pre-approved information sheet verbal explanation study obtain write consent . The consenting patient request fill baseline questionnaire . The patient request fill follow questionnaire six month baseline data collection via online , telephone paper-based questionnaire depend preference . Data require necessary agreement paper-based online telephone survey , collect 60 participant within two week baseline data collection . All patient receive continue normal treatment recommend primary care team . A participant may withdraw investigator , involve major trauma undergoes surgery , female participant become pregnant course study . Sample size estimate use G*Power ( version 3.1.5 ) . The statistical analysis perform use statistical software ( IBM SPSS 22 ) statistical significance set p < 0.05 entire analysis , unless mention . Descriptive statistic , interclass correlation coefficient , Bland-Altman limit agreement plot , significance testing , correlation regression analysis employ .
DOC.criteria: patient low back pain three month age 18 65 year baseline , community ambulant without walk aid , attend recently attend outpatient physiotherapy treatment UK National Health Service ( NHS ) chronic low back pain , able read , write understand English completing questionnaire diagnose cancer selfreported specific cause [ major trauma , fracture , ankylose spondylitis , grade 3 & 4 spondylolisthesis , severe spinal canal stenosis , lumbar intervertebral disc protrusion extrusion , spinal deformity ] chronic low back pain , underwent surgery within last one year lower back plan schedule major surgery come six month , pregnant experience childbirth last one year , patient cognitive impairment , neurological disease , severe vision hearing impairment
